report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters for BeeWalk
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional spnf ON spnf.id=s.id LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional sc ON sc.parent_sample_id=s.id LEFT JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=sc.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=sc.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE s.survey_id=178 AND #sharing_filter# #filters# #idlist#

column.name: vicecounty
column.sql: (SELECT tvc.term FROM location_attribute_values lvvc JOIN cache_termlists_terms tvc ON tvc.id=lvvc.int_value WHERE lvvc.location_id=s.location_id AND lvvc.location_attribute_id=377 AND lvvc.deleted=false ORDER BY lvvc.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: established
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=s.location_id AND location_attribute_id=40 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: transect_length
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=s.location_id AND location_attribute_id=39 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: section_length
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=49 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h1
column.sql: (SELECT cth1.term FROM location_attribute_values lvh1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth1 ON cth1.id=lvh1.int_value WHERE lvh1.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvh1.location_attribute_id=44 AND lvh1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h2
column.sql: (SELECT cth2.term FROM location_attribute_values lvh2 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth2 ON cth2.id=lvh2.int_value WHERE lvh2.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvh2.location_attribute_id=45 AND lvh2.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh2.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h3
column.sql: (SELECT cth3.term FROM location_attribute_values lvh3 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth3 ON cth3.id=lvh3.int_value WHERE lvh3.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvh3.location_attribute_id=46 AND lvh3.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh3.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h4
column.sql: (SELECT cth4.term FROM location_attribute_values lvh4 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth4 ON cth4.id=lvh4.int_value WHERE lvh4.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvh4.location_attribute_id=47 AND lvh4.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh4.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: habitat_description
column.sql: (SELECT text_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=48 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: l1
column.sql: (SELECT ctl1.term FROM location_attribute_values lvl1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctl1 ON ctl1.id=lvl1.int_value WHERE lvl1.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvl1.location_attribute_id=82 AND lvl1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvl1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: l2
column.sql: (SELECT ctl2.term FROM location_attribute_values lvl2 JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctl2 ON ctl2.id=lvl2.int_value WHERE lvl2.location_id=sc.location_id AND lvl2.location_attribute_id=83 AND lvl2.deleted=false ORDER BY lvl2.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: land_use_description
column.sql: (SELECT text_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=84 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
